definition: point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: It has peculiar character comparing with other interferometers.
sentences.chinese: 与其它干涉仪相比，具有独特的优点。

sentences.english: The advantages of iron ore-coal pellets covered with iron-concentrate shell are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了矿煤球团用铁精矿及添加剂包壳的优点。

sentences.english: I will start from their own, the Japanese learn their advantages.
sentences.chinese: 我也会从个人做起，向日本人学习他们的优点。

sentences.english: This face-protecting structure has remarkable advantages and is worthy of popularizing.
sentences.chinese: 该护面结构优点显著，有推广应用的价值。

sentences.english: All races have their pluses and their minuses and asian people are just the same.
sentences.chinese: 所有种族都有自己的缺点和优点，亚洲人也是如此。

sentences.english: The insect-killing machine has the advantage of better insect-killing effect.
sentences.chinese: 本杀虫机具有杀虫效果较佳的优点。

sentences.english: The object-oriented logical program design may unify these two kind of designs the merit.
sentences.chinese: 面向对象的逻辑程序设计可结合这两种设计的优点。

sentences.english: Sequencing batch reactor(SBR) has some advantages of continuous stirred tank reactor(CSTR) and plug flow reactor(PF).
sentences.chinese: SBR兼有全混合反应器与推流式反应器的优点。

sentences.english: Hoshikawa is like these three characters in one.
sentences.chinese: 星川兼具这三个角色的优点。

sentences.english: This medicine has advantages such as a persistent effect.
sentences.chinese: 药剂具有持效期长等优点。

sentences.english: Chemical modification was carried out by the radical polymerization of KH-570 and acrylate monomer.
sentences.chinese: 改性后的树脂具有丙烯酸树脂和有机硅聚合物的优点。

sentences.english: Tutorials have gained their reputation because of the close relationship they maintain between the tutor and the student.
sentences.chinese: 导师制最大的优点是学生能够得到个别指导。

sentences.english: The catalytic reactors have the functions of pre-drying, deoxigenation and sorbent regeneration, and are simple in structure, safe in operation and energy saving.
sentences.chinese: 它具有结构简单，使用安全可靠，不消耗能源等优点。

sentences.english: The map theory has at least two advantages over the Picture theory.
sentences.chinese: 相对于图像论而言，语言地图说至少有两个优点。

sentences.english: Continuous display of cab signals are put on wherever the train goes.
sentences.chinese: 列车无论在任何区段上机车信号连续显示等优点。

definition: to be in/to lie in/to consist in/to depend on/to rest with
